definition.text: The Task Server App Reference node holds the reference to a Task Server App node defined under a User Profile.

translations.text: Узел Task Server App Reference содержит ссылку на узел Task Server App, определенный в профиле пользователя.

paragraphs.text: Connecting to a Task Server App allows the current Task node to identify itself on the Superalgos Peer to Peer network.

translations.text: Подключение к Task Server App позволяет текущему узлу Task идентифицировать себя в сети Superalgos Peer to Peer.

paragraphs.text: Each task that connects to the peer to peer network will need to have a unique identity defined using its own Task Server App node.
